title: Door

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone dies by any means other than hanging, they become a goblin (4904.5)
- If you die, all goblins are dealt an overkill attack that cannot be blocked by any means
- You can secretly communicate with the Goblins.
- You can vote on a player to kill as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: inflict door based PTSD on the town.

desc:
Post 4904
*If ya couldn't tell, I'm trying to cure my PTSD of doors in DnD campaigns thanks to that one GIDnD rule. Obviously, it didn't work.*
